comments: This class is a GPA KILLER. Beware. Engineers the tests & grades based on what he thinks you deserve. Curves heavily because very few understand his lectures. When asked for help, states that "it is not his fault if you can\'t comprehend the material". Did not give attendance/participation points and group presentation is mandatory not EC as stated.
